name: staking-platform-sc
description: `npm ins tall` ### In stake_pool_bnb.ts, stake_pool_matic.ts, stake_pool_eth.ts => Update your _masterAddress ### run command in package.json to deploy SC   `npm run deploy_stake_bnb`   `npm run deploy_stake_eth`   `npm run deploy_stake_matic`   `npm run deploy_claim`
